title: Martin four
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts and Ben Hackworth
brief_description: Caught up in the claustrophobic world of his mother, who lives in a drunken haze of romantic memories of exotic places, an aimless young gay man tries to make a connection with love and life in the present. Cast includes Susan Lyons, Todd MacDonald, Suzi Dougherty and Suzy Cato.
creator_credit_for_label: Victorian College of the Arts and Ben Hackworth
